column1: Kata Robata////Phenomenal experience. Having lived in Japan and having had exceptional sushi
column2: I can say I was pleasantly surprised by the freshness and quality of their food. I'm more a nigiri Â fan
column3: but we ordered a roll first and it when it came out and tasted it
column6: please go and try them out. I'd recommend making a reservation as we got extremely lucky getting there right before they got busy and the wait time can easily reach 45min to an hour on the weekend.
